room_title: Escape room "National Heist: Locking Down Liberty" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: To celebrate my sister's birthday, we decided to steal the Declaration of Independence. There were six of us and we had a blast solving the clues in the National Heist room! I've done several escape rooms and this room had many unique puzzles that I haven't seen anywhere else. I would definitely go again!

room_title: Escape room "National Heist: Locking Down Liberty" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We had a group of 10 of us and escaped the National Heist! It was so much fun! This was the first escape room any of us had done and we are all hooked! We will be back again! Only escaped with 3 seconds to spare! Great time!

room_title: Escape room "National Heist: Locking Down Liberty" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: Completed this tonight, wonderful experience! Ps. The two of us pulled it off I recommend this for a date night!

room_title: Escape room "National Heist: Locking Down Liberty" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: Awesome experience and a lot of fun..... Definately enjoyed this and would recommend everyone to try. You will definitely have fun
